DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to analyze the change of nasalance after tonsillectomy in Thai adults.
DOC.brief_title: Change of Nasalance After Tonsillectomy in Thai Adult
DOC.criteria: Thai adults age over 18 years who were perform bilateral tonsillectomy The pathological are not malignancy Craniofacial anomalies Neurological problems History of Peritonsillar abscess Performed other operation beside tonsillectomy Can't read Thais Visual problem that effect reading Nasal disease that cause nasal obstruction
